definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
the power of sb or sth evil/the clutches (of a bad person etc)

sentences.english: What's Kalecgos' stance with the Nexus War?
sentences.chinese: 卡雷苟斯对魔枢之战的立场是什么？

sentences.english: Why does my heart seem to be of bedevilment?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我的心儿象是着了魔？

sentences.english: A puff of blue smoke came out and then a big jinnee.
sentences.chinese: 一股蓝烟冒出来，随即又冒出来一个巨大的魔仆。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔证实要经常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒适。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, he said he had " exorcized the demons."
sentences.chinese: 周二，他说他已经驱散了心魔。

sentences.english: In Menzoberranzan, families were traced solely through the mother.
sentences.chinese: 在魔索布莱，家族仅仅通过母系传承。

sentences.english: It is where yugoloths cavort on endless volcanic slopes .
sentences.chinese: 在那里尤哥罗斯魔活跃于无尽的火山斜坡之上。

sentences.english: As Voldemort, defeat Harry Potter in Duelling Club.
sentences.chinese: 在决斗俱乐部中以伏地魔战胜哈利波特。

sentences.english: Hardships in life are all matters of fortune.
sentences.chinese: 生活中的魔难，都是人生的财富。

sentences.english: Tom Riddle hides his snake inside. His ginormous secret chamber.
sentences.chinese: 伏地魔藏有一条蛇怪在他的密室之中。

sentences.english: The living statue sank to one knee before its drow master and awaited its orders.
sentences.chinese: 这座活生生的魔像跪在卓尔主人面前，等待他的命令。

sentences.english: Molly: It'll protect you from the boogeyman.
sentences.chinese: 我会保护你的从夜魔那里弄来的。
那正是我感受到佛地魔的瞬间。

sentences.english: Voldemort is also an accomplished Legilimens.
sentences.chinese: 伏地魔也是一个高超的摄神取念者。

sentences.english: I finally understand what call heart magic.
sentences.chinese: 我终于明白了什么叫心魔。

sentences.english: Since Voldemort refused to acknowledge Harry as significant, he underestimated Harry's intelligence and strenth. We all know what happened in the end.
sentences.chinese: 由于伏地魔轻视哈利波特，最后的结局大家都知道了。

definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
